column1: <div class="center borderdashed amablue2" style="PADDING-RIGHT: 5px; PADDING-LEFT: 5px; PADDING-BOTTOM: 5px; PADDING-TOP: 5px">
Free property search of over 500 commercial properties including industrial, office, retail and land opportunities within the Tameside area
• Ashton Regeneration - Business Support and Learning Network

The Business Support and Learning Network delivers Business Support services to small businesses within the Ashton Regeneration Project area. We can provide hands-on assistance, offer business advice, supply learning materials to develop business skills, even loan laptops with 3g internet connection. We also run a series of seminars and workshops on e-business development. Please go to the Ashton Underlined website for further information.
Business Continuity is a planning process, which provides a framework for ensuring the resilience of your business to threats and challenges.
a comprehensive searchable on-line directory of local businesses.
• New Business Directory: www.tamesidebusiness.co.uk
a searchable on-line directory of local businesses which is part of the new Tameside business website.
• Business Environment Association

links to the home site of TBEA which is a non-profit partnership organisation aimed at helping Tameside companies take full advantage of the benefits associated with improved control of the environmental aspects of their activities.

Tameside Libraries Information Service holds a wealth of business information in both print and electronic form. Among other things, we can provide business mailing lists, contact details, names of company directors and financial information. So whether you are trying to trace a particular company or find a list of contacts, we can help you!
• Business Land and Property Enquiries
Council owned property for sale or to lease.
providing help and support to existing small and medium sized businesses

This service is free of charge and brought to you by the Economic Development Unit, a team dedicated to helping you to do business in Tameside. Use this service to find available commercial property in Tameside. Then arrange a viewing through a commercial property agent.
for advice and information for business and investors
Information and advice for people thinking of starting a business
• Business Website for Tameside: www.tamesidebusiness.co.uk

This is a new website created in partnership with the University of Manchester. It encompasses a searchable business directory, which businesses can edit online, with free mini-websites available for every Tameside company and the opportunity to publicise events, news, and job vacancies. It also gives registered businesses access to a Forum and tools for computer supported collaborative working.
providing advice and awareness to local businesses in establishing a presence on the World Wide Web
if you are an employer, self-employed or in control of work premises you are required under RIDDOR to report some types of work related accidents, diseases and dangerous occurrences.
• Small Business Community Forums
a vendor independent interactive portal, designed to help local small businesses.
Old Street, Ashton, carries a wide range of business information resources, 0161 342 2031
includes latest tender invitations and how to tender to the authority
Our services are available to every commercial and industrial premises in the borough
Still not found what you are looking for? Try our Search or our A to Z of Services:
